description:
So, you have an idea for a project, but you need money to make it happen.  After my resounding success with Soundlazer and Lumapad, I'm here to show you how to use Kickstarter to turn your idea into a reality! 

This is a free preview of my paid course that contains lot's of useful information to help you create a successful Kickstarter campaign.
title: Reaching Your Kickstarter Goals
